title: Sound On: Red-Hot Inflation, CBO Score of BBB
itunes:title: Sound On: Red-Hot Inflation, CBO Score of BBB
description:
Bloomberg Government reporters Emily Wilkins and Jack Fitzpatrick co-hosted the show.

Guests: Wisconsin Congressman Marc Pocan, Arkansas Republican Congressman French Hill, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
